author: jeremias
msg: Test cases for table-omit-*-at-break. The one for footer is disabled because it's not implemented, yet.

author: jeremias
msg: Implemented table-omit-header-at-break. The same for footers comes later when page breaking is revisited.

author: jeremias
msg: Table headers/footers need to be recalculated for each page (for dynamic elements like page-numbers and changing page-masters together with auto layout). Therefore a new LM is created for each page.

author: gmazza
msg: Some simplification to StorePagesModel, removal of not very informative comment in PSLM.
